page.title: 17INDUSTRY - CURTIS ROAD
page.content: There is very little industry in the area, most of it is in the north east corner on the{Curtis Road Estate}near Dorking Town Station. The largest firm is{Johnston {Engineering}which has been established for 65 years and makes{road sweepers and{dustcarts}for councils all over the country. Other light engineering firms make{equipment for the railway and{wire winding machinery.}There is also a mill which produces{animal {compounds}for local farmers. In all just over 600 people are employed on the estate, the majority of whom are men who live in the Dorking area. Outside the Curtis Road Estate there is the{National Employers Life {Insurance Company}which employs 400 people. The company is situated in a 54 acre estate on the A25.
